column2: Are these sentences OK or not?
column3:
1 We've lived in this house for more than 20 years.

2 We've lived in this house more than 20 years. {{c1::Both 1 and 2 are OK.}}
column4: Only 1 is OK. / Only 2 is OK. / Both 1 and 2 are OK.

column2: Are these sentences OK or not?

column2: Are these sentences OK or not?
